info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weld County through 600 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Rockport, or 22 miles south of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Landspouts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ault, Pierce and Purcell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.
